title: Societies Act 1893 for a certain period and such further period (if any) as may
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Industrial and Provident Societies Act
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Industrial and Provident Societies Act 

1893 (Section 14A(1)) (Covid-19) Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited industrial provident society act 1893 (section 14a(1)) (covid-19) order 2020

title: Societies Act 1893 for a certain period and such further period (if any) as may
heading: In this Order “Act of 2020” means the Companies (Miscellaneous
text_raw:
2. 

In this Order “Act of 2020” means the Companies (Miscellaneous 

Provisions) (Covid-19) Act 2020 (No. 9 of 2020).
text_norm: 2 order act 2020 mean company (miscellaneous provisions) (covid-19) act 2020 (no 9 2020)

title: Societies Act 1893 for a certain period and such further period (if any) as may
heading: 3. The period beginning on 1 January 2021 and ending on 9 June 2021 is
text_raw:
3. The period beginning on 1 January 2021 and ending on 9 June 2021 is 
hereby specified as the period to which the interim period as defined in section 
79 of the Industrial and Provident Societies Act 1893 (56 & 57 Vict., c.39) 
(amended by section 29 of the Act of 2020) shall be extended in respect of the 
amendments effected by Part 3 of the Act of 2020. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

15 December, 2020. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach.
